scripts.doc:dependency-diagram: cargo run -p hash-repo-chores -- dependency-diagram --output docs/dependency-diagram.mmd --root hash-graph-postgres-queries --root-deps-and-dependents --link-mode non-roots --include-dev-deps --include-build-deps --logging-console-level info
scripts.test:integration:
clorinde live "postgresql://${HASH_GRAPH_PG_USER:-graph}:${HASH_GRAPH_PG_PASSWORD:-graph}@${HASH_GRAPH_PG_HOST:-localhost}:${HASH_GRAPH_PG_PORT:-5432}/${HASH_GRAPH_PG_DATABASE:-graph}" && printf '
[lints.rust]
dead_code = "allow"
exported_private_dependencies = "allow"
unused_imports = "allow"' >> clorinde/Cargo.toml && just sync-turborepo @rust/clorinde && git diff --exit-code clorinde
